verses.name: Psalms 91:1
verses.text: He that dwelleth in the secret place of the most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.

verses.name: Psalms 91:2
verses.text: I will say of the Lord, He is my refuge and my fortress: my God; in him will I trust.

verses.name: Psalms 91:3
verses.text: Surely he shall deliver thee from the snare of the fowler, and from the noisome pestilence.

verses.name: Psalms 91:4
verses.text: He shall cover thee with his feathers, and under his wings shalt thou trust: his truth shall be thy shield and buckler.

verses.name: Psalms 91:5
verses.text: Thou shalt not be afraid for the terror by night; nor for the arrow that flieth by day;

verses.name: Psalms 91:6
verses.text: Nor for the pestilence that walketh in darkness; nor for the destruction that wasteth at noonday.

verses.name: Psalms 91:7
verses.text: A thousand shall fall at thy side, and ten thousand at thy right hand; but it shall not come nigh thee.

verses.name: Psalms 91:8
verses.text: Only with thine eyes shalt thou behold and see the reward of the wicked.

verses.name: Psalms 91:9
verses.text: Because thou hast made the Lord, which is my refuge, even the most High, thy habitation;

verses.name: Psalms 91:10
verses.text: There shall no evil befall thee, neither shall any plague come nigh thy dwelling.

verses.name: Psalms 91:11
verses.text: For he shall give his angels charge over thee, to keep thee in all thy ways.

verses.name: Psalms 91:12
verses.text: They shall bear thee up in their hands, lest thou dash thy foot against a stone.

verses.name: Psalms 91:13
verses.text: Thou shalt tread upon the lion and adder: the young lion and the dragon shalt thou trample under feet.

verses.name: Psalms 91:14
verses.text: Because he hath set his love upon me, therefore will I deliver him: I will set him on high, because he hath known my name.

verses.name: Psalms 91:15
verses.text: He shall call upon me, and I will answer him: I will be with him in trouble; I will deliver him, and honour him.

verses.name: Psalms 91:16
verses.text: With long life will I satisfy him, and shew him my salvation.
